docs.name: Foreman
docs.info: Foreman v2 is currently in development and is not the default version. You may use v2 by either passing ‘version=2’ in the Accept Header or entering api/v2/ in the URL.

methods.name: destroy
examples:
DELETE /api/auth_source_ldaps/980190962
200
{
  "auth_source_ldap": {
    "account": null,
    "account_password": null,
    "attr_firstname": "givenName",
    "attr_lastname": "sn",
    "attr_login": "uid",
    "attr_mail": "mail",
    "base_dn": "dn=x,dn=y",
    "created_at": "2013-12-23T09:54:34Z",
    "host": "ldap",
    "id": 980190962,
    "ldap_filter": null,
    "name": "ldap-server",
    "onthefly_register": true,
    "port": 123,
    "tls": true,
    "updated_at": "2013-12-23T09:54:34Z"
  }
}
